Best Solution Found: (261)
01 06 17 12 08 20 07 14 13 05 03 15 18 16 11 09 04 02 19 10 01

01 06 = 4
06 17 = 21
17 12 = 21
12 08 = 18
08 20 = 16
20 07 = 10
07 14 = 12
14 13 = 22
13 05 = 27
05 03 = 6
03 15 = 11
15 18 = 8
18 16 = 5
16 11 = 20
11 09 = 13
09 04 = 18
04 02 = 11
02 19 = 2
19 10 = 13
10 01 = 3
